comments:
Build: integration build 20020611, WindowsXP Japanese, IBM Java 1.3.1 SR1

STEPS
1) make DBCS folder, default "new folder" in Japanese
2) unzip the build under the folder
3) make a shortcut for the java runtime
4) invoke it
